name: Dr. Kanteasa Rowell
what_you_do: 90 Day Wins is a podcast that provides goal-setting strategies for personal growth, health, business, and financial success, helping listeners achieve their dreams in 90 days.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves a diverse audience including stay-at-home moms, business executives, entrepreneurs, and individuals on personal growth journeys.
bio: The podcast has released 185 episodes since its inception in 2020 and features interviews with various individuals sharing their success stories.
business_focus: 90 Day Wins is a podcast that provides goal-setting strategies for personal growth, health, business, and financial success, helping listeners achieve their dreams in 90 days. (goal setting)
